detectors.description:
BaseToken._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__7.sol#15-24) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[_to] + _value > balanceOf[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__7.sol#18)
	- previousBalances = balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__7.sol#19)
	- balanceOf[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__7.sol#20)
	- balanceOf[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__7.sol#21)
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__7.sol#22)
